channel.title: Making a username a sertain length
channel.description:
I would like to make it so you can not just go on my client and press connect, So you have to input some sort of username in the box before you can actually connect to the server, is there anyway possible for this, using a Deltascape client source?
Thanks.

item.title: Making a username a sertain length
item.dc:creator: @jacked4fun1 jacked4fun1
item.description:
@jacked4fun1 wrote:

why the hell would you want that??

Read full topic
